item.title: Dave Portnoy speaks on whether Barstool Sports would fire employees for slandering Charlie Kirk
item.description: Dave Portnoy said insensitive comments "can have repercussions" amid social media users mocking Kirk assassination.

item.title: Trump's Iran ultimatum started a 60-day clock ticking for decisive June strikes, bomber commander reveals
item.description: U.S. bomber strikes on Iranian nuclear sites following Trump's ultimatum led to a ceasefire within 30 hours and reestablished deterrence against Iran.
